name: lipidmaps_tolerance
description: m/z tolerance value used for search query on LIPID MAPS database

name: lipidhome_tolerance
description: m/z tolerance value used for search query on LipidHome database

name: hmdb_tolerance
description: m/z tolerance value used for search query on HMDB database

name: delta_ppm_threshold
description: any delta_ppm value outside range -(delta_ppm_threshold) to +(delta_ppm_threshold) is deleted

name: search_criteria
description: COM: searches HMDB, LipidHome and computational data on LIPID MAPS. CUR: searches curated data on LIPID MAPS only. ALL: searches HMDB, LipidHome and both computation and curated data on LIPID MAPS.
